name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: channel_created
description: Date when channel was created in UNIX timestamp format.

name: channel_id
column5: Channel Id of a Slack channel.

name: channel_is_archived
description: 1 indicating that the channel is archived.

name: channel_is_general
description: 1 indicating that the channel is general.

name: channel_is_starred
description: 1 indicating that the channel is starred.

name: channel_member_count
description: Number of members in a Slack channel.

name: is_admin
description: 1 indicating the user is an admin.

name: is_owner
description: 1 indicating the user is an owner.

name: is_primary_owner
description: 1 indicating the user is a primary owner.

name: is_slack_message
description: 1 indicating the item is a message.

name: message_file_size
aggregatable: Total size of files in a message if present.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: number_attachs
description: Number of attachments in a message.

name: number_files
description: Number of files a message contains if present.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the channel was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: reaction_count
description: Number of reactions on a message.

name: reply_count
description: Number of replies on a message.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: user_data_bot
description: 1 if the given user is identified as a bot.

name: user_data_domain
description: Domain associated to the user in SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_gender
description: User gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: user_data_multi_org_names
description: List of the user organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_org_name
description: User's organization name from SortingHat profile.
